bio.en:
Addsimeon has been playing music since 1994 as a Professional DJ across Europe at Festivals, clubs and in the fields. After experimenting thru many genre's over the years you can hear the influences of his musical youth in his DJ Sets. The first ingredient in his sets is Bass.... Big, Fat Bass!!!
Equally at home playing Chunky Progressive Psy or Grooving on the 'other stage' while playing a journey selection of Downtempo Electronic thru World beats and Gypsy Skankers to Upbeat Dancy Dub Belters all woven together to create the right vibe at the right time. One thing you can be sure of.... there is always a big chunk of bass and a smiley face :)

In the last couple of years the Bedroom Productions have taken a step towards the Professional as an Artist/Remixer.

Remixes/Releases so far -

Hadra Records (Dr B.Brain - Unusual Spring Remix)
Phantasm Organic Groove (JuJu Planet Dub - Dub CiCi Remix).
Ape.Choons (Calma Dub - Smoking Dub Remix)
Tip-Top Underground (JuJu Planet Dub - Dubadelica Remix)
Hadra Altervision (Addsimeon - Anablue)


In the last 20 years or so as a DJ he has shared the stage with the biggest names in the psychedelic scene and beyond and played at some of the biggest festivals - Ozora (HUN), Hadra (fr), Blackmoon (It), Glade (UK), Glastonbury (UK), Noisily (UK), Harmonic (Fr). He has been on the line up at many of the best parties in the UK - Freak Bazaar, Party Possible, Enlightenment, Chichime, Wildthings, Acid Monkey, Boogie Fest

Airi is Felix A., a half Swiss/Japanese producer, currently residing in Lausanne, Switzerland. Having worked with electronic music since 2004, he has found a real passion in his expression through psychedelic music. He has had a musical education and has been a violinist since his childhood, as which he also used to play in the orchestra. Over the years he has developed his very own remarkable style of music, characterized by expressive sound design, massive basses and thoughtful atmospheres. Having rocked countless international dance floors, he never ceases to surprise his public with his powerful and intelligent signature sound. Watch out for this artist since he will keep innovating the genre for years to come.

Alta is the solo project of alastair crowther the man behind psymmetrix/dirty saffi and the co-founder of bom shanka music.

With Alta he pushes the boundaries of what is 'day time trance' making a solid set that has its feet well and truly in the sound of Zero1 Music but with that special dark twist that only someone behind the blasting sounds of dirty saffi can pull off.

Over 2 years in the making, Alta has tried to forge a link between daytime and night time, and no its not twilight, its just rocking psychedelic dance music. 'daytime with balls' is how he likes to describe it, you could call it proper clean rocking shit. music for your mind and body.

Hailing from the southwest region of the United States, Amani Friend has been a unique fixture in the underground electronic music scene, seasoned by over two decades of studio production and performance. From his early days at remote desert gatherings to his constant touring of clubs and music festivals with world-renowned downtempo sensation Desert Dwellers, his career has traversed many musical styles and genres. Blending world music with cutting-edge sound design, Amani Friend has amassed an enormous catalogue between his projects Desert Dwellers, Liquid Bloom, and Variant Field. Travelling the international festival circuit and staying on the road with a jam-packed schedule, Amani continues to bring his alchemy of ancient-future psychedelia to dance floors around the globe. Equally adept at sonically fueling the spirit of large yoga classes or high-energy dance floors, Amani’s sonic offerings provide a journey into the imaginative realms of movement and sound.

AngrY LunA is the side project of LunaRave , an epic hybrid psytrance style accross full-on melodics, high-tech Sound designs and fast bpm (165 to 200).. Really No words can describe it... so don't loose more time reading this and go give a listen right now !!

artists.name: Animalien

bio.en:
ANIMALIEN

Originated in Mexico from the sound lab of Mariano Tur after many years of experimenting with different projects and types of music which led him to bring this sound creature to life. A growling psychedelic twilight sound Inspired by the organic life forms in different planetary environments and the higher dimensional entities which affect the evolution of life and consciousness in mysterious ways

artists.label: PURPLE HEXAGON RECORDS / BELIEVE LAB RECORDS

bio.en:
Antonymous

is an artist from Athens, Greece.
He took his first steps in studying music at an early age in a private conservatory, where he took
piano lessons and practiced with different harmonium keyboards.
Around 2000, psytrance caught his attention and after many years of following the scene,
playing DJ sets and experimenting his own ideas in various genres, the project was born.
His first tracks as well as his debut EP “The Ascending Path? were released by Sonic Loom
Music.
Since then he has performed in many festivals all over the world such MoDem, Freqs of Nature,
Earth Dance & Ritual and has released tracks with major labels of the scene.
In the meantime together with Tromo they have created the side project Quadraphonic.
Antonymous is constantly exploring the psychedelic sound which aims to take the listener on a
journey where body n’ mind will follow and his currently working on releasing his personal
Album.

bio.fr:
Aora Paradox est un laboratoire d’expérimentations sonores né en 2017 de l'envie de proposer une musique mêlant des univers diamétralement opposés.
Du rock progressif aérien au trip-hop obscur en passant par la musique du monde, ce projet a pour but de vous faire partager des histoires et des images pleine de couleurs.
Le duo Grenoblois composé de YoY et de sa chanteuse Nao vous propose un live alliant voix chaleureuse au langage inventé , guitare électrique et diverses machines, pour un moment hors du temps.

bio.en:
Le Français d'origine DJ Zen aka Astral Waves s'installe au Québec au milieu des années 90.
Il mixe alors dans plusieurs événements et co-organise l'un des premiers festivals psychédéliques d'ampleur de la province, le légendaire Natura.

Après un séjour au Costa Rica, il est de retour depuis 2002 dans la province et travaille sans cesse sur de nouvelles productions musicales pour son projet Astral Waves en plus de diriger le label Altar Records.

Personne d'influence dans la scène trance psychédélique au Québec et à l'échelle internationale, il est fondateur de la maison de disque Altar Records et on le connaît également sous son projet live Astral Waves, qui apporte au Psybient une touche de deep prog avec un kick lourd et profond.

ENG:

Astral Waves is DJ Zen aka Gabriel D. from Quebec, Canada.
Originally from France, he is one of the original pioneers of the Canadian Trance scene. After several attempts in the period of 1988-1993, he moved for good to north America in 1996 with a full CD bag of Goa Trance classics. Shortly after meeting organizers in Quebec, he spinned in after hours, clubs and raves all around the place. He was also making backdrops to decorate places, hand painted t-shirts and always had a kiosk to sell CD’s. After having spinning for 4 years and organizing “Natura? wonderful parties with his brother, he settled up his first music studio in 1999 using Reason 1.0 and Acid 3.0 to start to make music with Khetzal and make some remixes from well known bands like Juno Reactor.

DJ Zen created Altar Records in 2010. He's the manager and owner of the label since then. He does DJ and live sets on demand and does mainly all artwork and audio mastering for Altar Records. His music production as Astral Waves has gathered him some praise in the psychill scene as well as the numerous compilations he has done for Altar and diverse labels.

Since their very first psytrance parties more than fifteen years back in time the Berliners Kevin Hentschel and Rafael Gomez never stopped experimenting with electronic sounds. Alongside multiple excursions into various sub-genres, ownlabel activities and many open air- and club events the two friends concentrate since 2012 on the production of drivingpsychedelic trance music. After some releases in Spain and further mindblowing experiences while playing large festivals– such as the Fusion Festival – the two musicians reinventedtheir sound – and themselves – as „Atacama“.Sometimes mysterious, always complex and preferencialdriving Atacama carry off their listeners in spheres betweenbygone experiences and oncoming promises where mythsand reality, rhythm and movement merge into a cosmic unity

By the age of 14, Audioflow already owned his first machine, a Groovebox. Straight off, he made his way playing at rave parties spreading his music through out France and nearby countries. In 2010, he took his machines off to China for the Electronic World Festival tour, sharing the stage with Li Daiguo, a traditional chinese musician. Since then, his voracious appetite for live techno performance and producing has been unquenchable. Discovering Audioflow live is like getting caught in a mysterious science fiction web: it's dark and futuristic as well as melodious and luminous. He carries you away into his world with his atmospheric liveset, enchanting and bursting with creativity.
Currently on the following record labels: NCTRN Recods, Maison Des Musiques Alternatives, Toolbox records, Pain Beurre record, his last live was passed entirely under the press for a double vinyl on Toolbox records.
He has shared the stage with: Extrawelt, Perfect Stranger, Groove Delight, Alex Stein, A Skillz, Mollono Bass, Be Svendsen, Meat Katie, Khainz, Manel Diaz, Broken Note, Odjbox, Crystal Distortion, 69 db, Ixi, Jeff 23...

bio.fr:
1 ans apres la sortit de la compile "DUBIQUINONE" B Brain ,
reviens une fois de plus retourner le dance floor de la scene Alternative avec un Dj set Dub Jungle explosif !!!

artists.name: BUNKELD (BASS BIN)
artists.label: The Bass Bin
artists.bio:
Keep it tidy! The Bass Bin crew bringing their rubbish vibes with two fully mobile 12V wheelie bin sound systems. They will be wheeling their latest upgrade which is one of the loudest wheelie bin systems in the UK.
The Bass Bin aims to entertain, inspire and educate about DIY sustainable living possibilities, in a fun and informal way.
It does exactly what it says on the bin. Not rubbish, rolling micro events in any location.

bio.fr:
Engagé depuis 2008 dans le développement de l’association Hadra comme directeur et programmateur du festival, Benoît quitte en 2016 l’ombre pour la lumière de la scène avec un projet DJ baptisé Benzinho. Ce dernier s’inscrit dans la continuité de son travail de programmation et propose une épopée au coeur des esthétiques psydub, funk et glitch en faisant la part belle aux artistes de Merkaba Music, Shanti Planti ou encore Maia Brasil Records. Les basses rondes et les sonorités à la fois groovy, mélodiques et instrumentales de sa sélection font de ses sets un voyage éclectique et scintillant.

Involved in Hadra since 2008 as general manager and musical programmer for the Hadra Trance Festival, Benoît stepped into the limelight of the stage in 2016 with a DJ project named Benzinho. Carrying on with his role of programmer, he proposes a journey in the depths of psydub, funk and glitch international scene featuring artists from Merkaba Music, Shanti Planti or Maia Brasil Records. The groovy, melodic and instrumental sounds of his selections bring eclecticism and brightness to his sets.

bio.en:
German based Boom Shankar is a Dj for Psychedelic Trance, the label manager
of BMSS Records and an event promoter within Europe. Having been initiated
into the Goa Trance scene in the early Nineties and by traveling the globe ever
since, his sets are a mirror of the constant melting pot of fundamental
Psytrance characteristics.

Whether he is guiding the dance floor through the night or into the morning,
the outcome is always a voyage filled with a depth and an energy that allows
the crowd to feel a sense of freedom through Trance. Groovy, deep, mature,
hypnotic and clearly distinguishable.

Having played at many underground & major events worldwide, he has
developed a full understanding of the flow and the energies of each dance floor
and is flexible in terms of "styles".

Through his impromptu sets, he is able to interact personally with each dance
floor, taking the audience on a trans-formative journey. His sets are a direct
form of communication through music.

Besides this, Boom Shankar is the label manager of BMSS Records where he
has released 8 best-selling compilations so far:

Transmissions, Transition, Cosmic Connections, Trancendance and Trancefusion
feat. artists such as Aes Dana, Braincell, Tristan, Sonic Species & Avalon, Eat
Static, Pogo, Lucas & Mechanimal, Egorythmia, Ovnimoon, Touch Tone,
Audioform, Headroom & Zen Mechanics, Entheoegenic, Talpa, Martian Arts,
Outsiders, ManMadeMan and many more.

He is working on his ninth one which will probably see the light in spring of
2018.

In addition, Boom Shankar is part of the S.U.N. Festival crew in Hungary, the
Alice im Wummerland party series in Germany plus is involved in many other
global productions.

There are many Colors in the spectrum , And CeZZers LOVE them all.
To choose one would be too difficult a task for them.

CeZZers are Arye Siluk & Ran Shalev.
A Psychedelic Electronic music duo from Israel
Formed in 2012, The project has preformed on many stages
all around the world , from the most underground raves to the
the biggest Psychedelic festivals.
They are Best known for their unique style called "Hybrid Psytrance"
which fuses between a wide range of elements from the
Psytrance music world.

Their Creation is purely mood based...
Without any boundaries or limitations ,they take everything
that has gathered in their subconscious minds
and spill it out into their tunes.
Taking huge inspiration from the Cinematic music world,
CeZZers have totally embraced the approach of Sound Design.

In Addition to their Psy-Trance creations...
CeZZers have developed a new form of Psychedelic Live-Show which
focuses more on their capabilities as Live musicians.
The Concept of the Live-Show is that every sound and musical part
is played, recorded and looped in Real time using live instruments
such as Guitars , Synthesizers, Percussive Instruments and many other
organic sources of sound.

bio.fr:
Gregory Aka Dj Chai influencer depuis 1994 par la Trance Goa, représente actuellement en France le label Canadien Altar records pour vous présenter les derniers tracks des nombreux artistes du label( Astral waves,, suduaya, Profondita,....... ) Son style vous fera voyager à travers le monde, en écoutant des rythmes, des percussions et des mélodies trances parfois saturées qui oscillent entre 90 et 120 BPM
Son but est promouvoir la musique chillout et downtempo et évidement d autres labels internationaux . Dernières expériences Hadra Festival 2016, Outrance, Hadra psychedelic afertnoon .....

bio.en:
Coam is an electronic music live act based in Israel and the person behind this act is Amit Marco.
The main style of "Coam" music is Downtempo, Psychill, & Electronica blended with Tribal & live Instrument's worldwide.
Between the Electronic synthesized sounds you can hear the Melody of everyday life and the tunes of this unique project are an optimistic expression of how music can draw the listener to a blissful & joyful zone.

bio.fr:
Passionné par la synthèse sonore, Cubic Spline trouve son unicité dans les atmosphères très travaillées et les textures sonores déroutantes, avec un penchant tout particulier pour les ambiances mélancoliques.
Après un premier album « Paradigm Shift » sorti en 2012 sur Hadra Records et « Oxymora » en 2015, suite logique et attendue du premier opus, il prépare son deuxième EP pour la fin 2017. Cubic Spline nous transporte dans un univers de clair­obscur orchestral qui captive inévitablement son auditoire !

Fascinated by sound synthesis, Cubic Spline finds his uniqueness in very elaborated atmospheres and by puzzling sound textures, with a quite particular tendency for melancholic atmospheres.
After his first album ‘Paradigm Shift’, out in 2012 on Hadra Records and ‘Oxymora’ in 2015, result logical and expected from the first opus, he’s preparing his second EP for the end of 2017.
Cubic Spline transports us in a universe of orchestral twilight which captivates inevitably his public.

Curious Detail's music is tribal and hypnotic. A powerful rolling psytrance, a minimalism techno influence, the colors of a polymorph scoring and sound-design.
Clément has been trained as a bass-clarinet player. He began compositions of his own at early age, attracted by the logic structures and the infinite soundscapes of psytrance. Today, he's delivering a personnal message through a dark powerful atmospherical music.

La musique de Curious Detail évolue dans un style tribal et hypnotique, une psytrance soutenue et puissante, le minimalisme de la techno, les couleurs d'une orchestration et d'un sound-design polymorphes.
Après une formation en clarinette basse, il créa son projet à 17 ans attiré par la multiplicité et la richesse de la psytrance. Aujourd'hui il ancre son style dans une musique sombre, atmosphérique et profondément psychélique.

D.Rec (prononcez "derek") est un DJ spécialisé dans les musiques psychédéliques depuis 2008.

Il se démarque de ses homologues par une volonté d’être très diversifié dans ses styles et de défendre les genres émergeants de la scène actuelle (c’est à dire ceux qui ne marchent pas encore, et ont besoin d’êtres poussés vers le haut.)

Il a participé à de nombreux projets, autour du monde de la Psytrance et des musiques électroniques depuis son plus jeune âge (il est l’une des personnes qui ont porté l’association Hadra et son festival lors de ses éditions a Lans en Vercors entre 2010 et 2013, le projet Ethereal Decibel Company depuis 2014, Chilluvium (projet d’open air Chillout) depuis 2016, et bien plus encore)

Il a longtemps évolué dans l’ombre, car le fait d’être placé sous les projecteurs ne l’a jamais vraiment attiré, préférant organiser les évènements et pousser les courants grandissant dans le paysage français.

Mais depuis 2013, il a commencé à être reconnu comme un acteur montant de la scène française grandissante, avec des dates de festival européens, comme le Hadra Trance Festival, le Momento Demento (Croatie) ou encore le Human Evolution (Italie)

Il propose un éventail musical diversifié, caractérisé par 2 extrêmes radicalement opposés : des plus pures sonorités lumineuses quand il joue ses sets chillout, jusqu’a la darkpsy sombre, rapide, et industrielle autour de 160 BPM, pour combler le trou béant laissé entre la Forest et la Hitek. (avec tout ce qui peut se trouver entre les 2)

bio.en:
Put some samples in the tracks, taken from sources such as, documentaries, films and lectures, to enable some hearing in Portuguese! Possibly the mother tongue was premiered on land Lusa on psychedelic movement!
He worked for the label Ayauaska Rec, sharing a label with the names of the Portuguese scene which stands out, Suria and N3xus.
Ivã had his first contact with the psychedelic world in 1997, close to the beginning of the sykadelic movement in Portugal. His interest began through visual arts; his education was related to the plastic arts.
Began around 1998 as a GoaTrance DJ when a friend (DJ Marte) asked him to join a small party. The Muses Rapt was the first project that captured their attention seriously, and to date his friend heart.
With the help of most close friends in 1999, created the BlueSphere label, he co-produced some events with names like Chris Organic, Mick Chaos, Infected Mushroom and Bamboo Forest for the first time in Portugal.
He was known for his attitude in the middle, contagious!
Over the years his interest to softer environments grew, and he began to improve his technique as a Chillout DJ. He founded the project Tachyon with Daniel (Zen Baboon). In his sets, Ivã creates an intense and emotional journey, using some sounds psychedelic, progressive, and some world music, all mixed in a very happy and relaxed.
Since 2005 is part of the international team Electrik Dream, with the guidance of Stephan (Tajmahal).
Through all these years, besides his work as a DJ, Ivã did some work as a VJ and participated in co-production of various forms at numerous parties of nearly all the labels in Portugal.
Since 2007 until now is the manager of the Chillout/Alternative area of Freedom Festival.

bio.fr:
Personne d'influence dans la scène trance psychédélique au Québec et à l'échelle internationale, DJ Zen est le fondateur de la maison de disque Altar Records et on le connaît également sous son projet live Astral Waves, qui apporte au Psybient une touche de deep prog avec un kick lourd et profond.

ENG:
Strong character of influence in the psychedelic trance scene in Quebec and internationally known, DJ Zen is the founder of the Altar Records label, and is also known for his Astral Waves live project, which brings to the Psybient a touch of deep prog and a heavy and deep kick.

Représentant, au sein du label Hadra Records, d'une trance progressive hybride aux sonorités minimales et aux rythmiques aérées, D_Root propose une musique colorée et un style à part.
Après un premier album Root'Art sorti en 2010 et de nombreuses participations aux compilations du label, Aurélien a présenté en 2014 son second album, Purkinje, du nom des fibres musculaires qui participent à la coordination des battements du coeur humain.
A l'image de ce projet, la musique de D_Root et très vivante et organique, à la fois lumineuse et mélancolique, elle est une épopée rythmée dans les univers éclectiques et métissés de la musique électronique moderne.

bio.en:
Phoebus was attracted by the music phenomenon in his early age. Always searching for deeper meanings in every music style, trying to realise the parameters of quality.
His first touch with electronic music was in 1998 and ever since became a lover of this style and its later developments.
In early 2000 he had already started making his own sounds with whatever equipment came in hand. After finishing his studies in music technology in 2007 he decided to really focus on what he likes best..making music !!
That's the time he forms "Sygnals" with his good friends & partners Alex A.(R.I.P) & Aristides K. focused mainly in psychill & downtempo electronic sounds. The "Daoine Sidhe" project (sounds like Deenee Shee) is his approach in an experimental fusion of sounds from almost every electronic music style.
Finally in "Dendrobates" project (literally means "the one who walks on trees") he focuses in the full power psychedelic era of sound. Naturally derived from the several years exploring the forests, in quest of imprinting nature’s complex tones.
C u aRounD !!

bio.fr:
Projet développé suite à plusieurs années de découvertes en le milieu psytrance, Deep Lodocus vous fait voyager dans un univers musicalement contemplatif crée dans le but de vous faire lâchez prise sur vos pensées vos émotions et vos sentiments.

Deep Ambient experimental

bio.en: Desert Dwellers consists of Amani Friend and Treavor Moontribe, each of whom began their careers as independent music producers and DJs in the deserts of New Mexico and California. Coming together in the late 1990s after connecting through the Moontribe events in the deserts outside Los Angeles, today the duo enjoys a reputation as one of the most pioneering and prolific downtempo acts in the United States. Their collaborative power has resulted in numerous full-length albums, remix projects for other artists, and EPs for labels like Black Swan, Twisted, and their own label Desert Trax, among many others.

bio.fr:
D'origine grenobloise, DEYOSAN est un trio à l'univers contrasté qui mélange musiques du monde et musiques électroniques.
Aux sons de leurs instruments, les musiciens nous invitent, à leur manière, à un voyage métissé au-delà des frontières, tout en laissant place aux songes et à l'imaginaire.
La clarinette, au teint boisé, aime allier sonorités orientales
avec distorsion et autres pédales d'effets.
Quand le sitar, lui, nous évoque l'Inde et ses mélodies envoutantes.
Les machines et la batterie s'accordent alors à ne faire plus qu'un, orchestrant le tout tantôt sur des accents tribaux, tantôt sur des rythmiques dub.
Vous laisserez vous captiver par ce voyage aux multiples horizons ?

bio.en:
DifaZ is the Techno side project by Fadi from the Dark Progressive duo Itchy & Scratchy.

it's been a longtime he wanted to come back to his roots as a Dj,
so he did and it's through a great selection of different kind of techno music such as Deep Techno, Industrial and Psytechno that he will make you explore the Depths of his MINDS !!

Let the Journey begin !!!

High grade psychedelic dance music.  Dirty Saffi is Al from Psymmetrix and DJ Nuky; one is a production monkey the other a DJ, which makes for great combination of understanding of how to make a well structured track and what it should sound like. They have been playing their project in many countries and many of the biggest festivals, as well as countless underground parties where their high energy live set ensures that the dancefloor rocks and no one leaves without a smile on their face. They are now finishing their new album  that will be released before the end of the year. Keep connected!

bio.fr:
Dr fractal est un projet de trance psychédélique qui a été créé en 2013. Musicien de puis de nombreuses années, il découvre les musiques électroniques dont il tombe amoureux (techno , minimal , drum and bass , experimental...) mais plus particulièrement la trance. Il a commencé sur Fl Studio mais se mettra rapidement sur Ableton live ce qui lui permettra une plus grande ouverture en therme de possibilité et de live pur et dur. en 2015 il rentre chez les "Freacky Carnival Sound System" qui l'ont beaucoup fait avancé et lui on permis de faire de nombreuse rencontres dans ce milieu. En 2016 il rentre dans le label "Namasté Records" ce qui lui donnera une ouverture sur d'autres artistes et qui lui permettra d'avoir plus de booking. Il sortira chez Namasté Records son premier album "Fragment Of The Univers" en 2017, et c'est en 2018 qu'il commencera à sortir des tracks sur d'autres labels.

Dr fractal is a psychedelic trance project created in 2013 after discovering the world of free party and especially for the world of trance. He began on Fl Studio and made many different styles of electronic sounds but with the time he will focus on trance.
In 2015 he started the composition on Ableton for more possibility, for the live and he goes into "Freaky Carnival Soundsystem".
In 2016 he joined Namast? Records which will give him more booking and released his first album "Fragment of the universe" in 2017.

bio.en: Behind Drip Drop is Michail Chavales , a 34 years old Greek born in Athens in 1983. Michael's interest in electronic music started in the early 90s.He slowly started producing music in 2005 while he is studying sound engineering in SAE institute and in 2009 he joined Harmonia rec family and  makes his first release under the project Ridden . Meanwhile and after performing in events around the world  the idea of Drip Drop was born and immediately Michael started to  work on these new basis. In 2014 the  Drip Drop Album was released from Harmonia, by knowing big success in most of the dance-floors worldwide. Since then, and after participating in some of the biggest festivals around the globe  and releasing quite enough tracks for VA’s and compilations  , for 2018  Michael  is going to present you the new adventure  “Drip Drop in Lost City?, the second full album of Drip Drop coming soon from Harmonia Records .Stay tuned for more and don’t forget 2 “drop?…...

After creating several projects in different kinds of music (oddwave, smooth criminal, A slower day) GROZDANIC Théo decides now to give his talent for psytrance music with his own textures, sound designs and signature.
All track are created to follow a groovy psychedelic dancefloor adventure.
Let’s start a new game with EARTHWORM! Wild, Jumpy, Loud & Happy!

bio.fr:
Eco Jafar, grew up in the dance world at the age of 14 years old
HipHop / Contemporain / Krump/ Newstyle.
He moved closer to electronic music 9 years later to explore new horizons,
new sounds

He found an originality, an wealth instrumental and a feeling of family.
That lead him to create his own music to share his energy, these feelings, through his music.

After 5 years on the Trance stage with the association Illusion Sonore,
this Freak straight from the jungle, experimenting an electric psychedelic live with forest sounds on a progressive Flow. (138 to 145 bpm )

Eco Jafar , grandit dans le milieu de la danse dès ses 14 ans HipHop / Contemporain / Krump/ Newstyle. Il se rapproche vers la musique électronique 9 ans après pour explorer de nouveaux horizons,
de nouvelles sonorités.

Il y trouve une originalité , une richesse instrumental et un univers familiale qui le mènent à créer sa propre musique afin de partager son énergie , ces émotions à travers ça musique.

Après 5 ans sur la scène Trance auprès de L’association Illusion Sonore,
cette créature tout droit venue de la Jungle expérimente un live psychédélique électrique avec des sonorités Forest sur un Flow progressif.
(138 / 145 Bpm)

EkaOlogik est un duo live composé de Patrick ABOS et Yoanna NICOLA.
Issus d'une formation trip hop , les deux artistes créent aujourd'hui une musique down tempo psybient, mélange subtil de leurs influences shoegaze, trance, dub, post rock et new age.
Leur live, hypnotique et aérien, vous emmène dans un univers sonore ou les rythmes progressifs dansent avec de fines mélodies, enveloppées par des nappes souvent saturées. Association de sons synthétiques et de lignes acoustiques, qu’il créent eux-même (chants, flûte, guitare, violon).
Le projet a vu le jour en 2009 et a joué son premier live à l'occasion du festival ambiant Ambiosonic. Il s’agit à ce moment d’un live pur machine, hardware (MC 909).
Puis en 2013 , les « ekaO » commencent à s’intéresser à la technique de production MAO, en composant des titres toujours ambient.
A partir de 2015, les créations s’intensifient aboutissant en 2016 sur un set live psybient. Depuis le début, ekaOlogik s'est produit sur différentes scènes et festivals (Ambiosonic Festival , Hadra Trance festival, Harmonic Festival, Eclectic, Equinoxe, Magic Castle, The psychedelic box, work in progress Transubtil...) .
Ils figurent dans les compilations : Hadracadabra 5, Turlitava 2 et Chiling Dragon Tales.
Leur album psybient "Light Seeds" sorti en 2017 sous le label Hadra Altervision Records, est suivi d'un ep digital "Perseida" qui sort au printemps 2018 également sous ce label.




EkaOlogik is a live duet composed of Patrick ABOS and Yoanna NICOLA. From a trip hop band, the two artists today create a psybient down tempo music, subtle blend of their shoegaze, trance, dub, post rock and new age influences. Their live, hypnotic and aerial, takes you into a world of sound or progressive rhythms dance with fine melodies, wrapped by sounds often saturated. A combination of synthetic sounds and acoustic lines, which they create themself (voices, flute, guitar, violin). The project was born in 2009 and played its first live at Ambiosonic Ambient Festival. It is at this moment a live pure machine, hardware (MC 909).Then in 2013, the "ekaO" begin to take an interest in the MAO production technique, composing always ambient songs. From 2015, the creations intensify culminating in 2016 on a psybient live set. From the beginning, ekaOlogik has performed on different stages and festivals (Ambiosonic Festival, Hadra Trance festival, Harmonic Festival, Eclectic, Equinox, Magic Castle, The psychedelic box, Transubtil work in progress ...). They appear in compilations: Hadracadabra 5, Turlitava 2 and Chiling Dragon Tales. Their psybient album "Light Seeds" released in 2017 under the label Hadra Altervision Records, is followed by a digital ep "Perseida" which comes out in spring 2018 also under this label.

bio.en: Floating Machine is António Lourenço, from Coimbra – Portugal. Since very young he felt in love with music. Learned and played regularly many instruments like guitar, piano or saxophone and took part in various experimental projects in distinct areas like jazz, hip-hop or punk rock. Later, influenced by the electronic music magic, he started to DJ, exploring all its diversity, from downtempo to dance sonorities like acid jazz, nu-jazz, dub, breakbeat or deep house... Naturally, this leads to electronic music production, applying all his influences in a techno and progressive context and also leaning deeply into the palette of ambient experimental sounds. Performed in countless events and big international festivals such as Boom Festival, Freedom Festival, Zna Gathering, Shankra, among others, and you can find his music on Digital Diamonds, Techgnosis, Mindspring and his "home", Blind Arc. António is also one-half of Code Therapy, an ascending progressive techno act. A person without many words, he uses music to connect and communicate, taking the listener to adventurous and unpredictable aural journeys.

Without limits, merging elements of techno, minimal, hypnotic and psychedelic. A massive hybrid genre projecting darkness only measurable on richter scale magnitude. Pounding the dance floor swiftly and mercilessly. Bombing it with frenzy  rhythmics. Aggressive and repetitive, almost like mental blitzkrieg. Stuff that grabs you from the guts without noise or sanguine saturation and always without boundaries.

artists.name: Fog

bio.en: Last time i played in the Hadra altrnative stage it was at Hadra festival first edition in Chorges Hautes Alpes and back then i played a chill out and downtempo djset. Played several more times in the Hadra mainstage but super happy to make it back int he alternative, after 13 years and with some different music. This time gonna treat u with a glitchy experimental to techno set which i've been working on in the past few years. I find this music super inspiring and i'm gonna show you the best of the collection i digged in many years of research. This is gonna be my first techno set at a festival and i'm very much looking forward to this new experiecnce. You can expect some super fat & cunky basslines, solid production and very long and neat mixes.

artists.label: LOONEY MOON RECORDS / LOONEY MOON EXPERIMENT

bio.en: Jeremie Mahaut a.k.a. G-RM discovered electronic music during the free parties of the nineties.  and after several years of exploring different musical genres and styles, found his main calling in Psytrance. he joined Blacklite Records which has since allowed for many opportunities for his growth and career. Travelling the world, he has, shared the decks with some of most influential artists for his genre such as Polaris, Earthling, Dimitri Nakov, Nukleall, Earthspace and Audioform just to name a few.

Gagarin Project is a collective of conscious artists, music producers, dancers and DJ's. We explore the realms of mind expanding music. The live sets are not limited to a certain genre, juggling between ambient, modern psychedelic bass music, psytrance and techno grooves.

Gagarin Project is the international project that has evolved from the ideas of conscious living, kindness and love to other humans, our brothers and sisters. Moreover it’s activity is greatly inspired by the values and traditions of ancient civilizations, universal principles of love, natural and healthy lifestyle.

bio.fr:
"Always passionate about music, I had the chance to grow up in an manifold musical universe.
The abundance of the different styles and the possibilitys to combine them, pushed and motivated me to create mixes since 2011 in the style psygressive/ darkprog.

Listen to the story and allow you on the dancefloor to release all your energy!"
*********************************************

"Gina grandie dans un univers musical très varié. Passionnée de musique depuis toujours
elle découvre le mouvement trance et elle est très vite fascinée.

La richesse des différents styles musicaux et les possibilités de les combiner la pousse
a créer des mix depuis 2011 dans le style psygressive/ darkprog.
Ses mix dynamiques et atmosphériques racontent une histoire riche en facettes,
qui permet au dance floor de dégager toute son énergie.

bio.en: Gumnut is the sonic incarnation of Sydney producer Jack Layard, who burst onto the psy-scene in 2016 with his debut release ‘Nuts and Bolts’ on Kinematic Records. Jack brings his years of experience as a bass player and guitarist to the table, frequently incorporating organic instrumentation infused with glitchy psychedelic sound design. Gumnut’s sound, influenced by a range of genres including jazz, funk, rock and blues, is a unique fusion of melodic grooves and bouncy basslines, packed with a tonne of live instrumentation. Intelligent progressive psytrance that transcends boundaries and limitations, oozing a positive frequency evocative of afternoon stomps in the Australian bush!

Halfred is the culmination of years and years of aural exploration. Originally a drummer, the Italian born sonic warrior found his roots in drumming which led him to music production, along with a degree in electronic music production at SAE, in Milan.
His eclectic approach makes it hard to categorize his music and this is partially due to the fact that his sound breaks the often repetitive mold of psy music, seamlessly taking the forms of dub, hip- hop, drum n bass, garage, and world music and while staying true to his signature sound and focused on the micro details, he’s constantly experimenting with the squishy and granular side of psychedelic mid-tempo, drum n bass, dubstep, psybass and all things psychedelic.
During last years, he collaborated and remixed top notch artists like Desert Dwellers, Whitebear, Tribone, Zebbler Encanti Experience, Tryptich and had releases on labels such as Merkaba Music, Shanti Planti, Outtallectuals, Gravitas Recordings, Wakaan and more, as well as playing many festivals in the European scene, such as Modem, Lost Theory, Sonica, Create Culture, Wormhole Wednesdays and Final Fridays.

bio.fr:
= ENGLISH =

I started my musical journey as a drummer in the early 90's, before I got strongly contamined by psychedelic trance in 2005. After a while, I tried to cure myself by cooking my own beats and also quickly learn how to use turntables.

Since my first party behind the decks in 2009, I have been blasting all kind of imaginable dancefloor: forest, club, squat, beach, church, jungle, boat, castle, mountain, resort or bunker, and shared the stage with all of my favourite artists around the world.

My debut album "Smoking Skills" was finally released in 2018 on World People Prod, after one EP, one chill album and more than 15 tracks on different VA's... So much more to come!

= FRANCAIS =

Après avoir tapé plus de 10 ans sur une batterie et formé plusieurs groupes allant du métal au funk en passant par le hip hop, j’ai fini par m’intéresser à la synthèse sonore vers 2008. Et au mix dans la foulée.

C’est avec le collectif Bruxellois Elektro Magnetik que j’ai fait mes débuts, avec un premier dj set en 2009 et mon tout premier live en 2010.

Depuis, j’ai eu la chance de faire péter mes sons sur une flopée de dance floors complètement barrés: église, chateau, squat, forêt, jungle, plage, montagne, volcan, bateau, safari parc, bunker, et de partager régulièrement le line up avec les artistes qui m’ont toujours inspirés. Ici ou là: Belgique, France, Allemagne, Pays-Bas, Suisse, Portugal, Ibiza, Croatie, Italie, Slovénie, Hongrie, Russie, Roumanie, Lituanie, Mexique, Guatemala, Inde et même Luxembourg..

C’est finalement chez World People Prod qu’est sorti mon premier album psy, « Smoking Skills », en 2018, après un EP et un album Chill chez Green Tree Rec, et plus de 15 tracks sur diverses compilations.

On est sur du twilight, groovy forest, autour des 148-150 bpm, avec un flow hypnotique et des lignes de basses massives, enveloppées dans des textures qui chatouillent, tantôt élastiques, tantôt corrosives.

A découvrir bientôt: des collab’s avec, entre autres, Virtual Light, Synthetic Chaos, Phase, Chakraview, Wood Warden,…

bio.en:
HypoGeo is "Anything that originates, grows and evolves beneath the earth".

The description perfectly fits the music: deep, obscure, hypnotic, mental, filthy and psychedelic.

It takes shades through the producer's musical background: orchestrated by extreme metal, industrial & EBM, New Wave, Noise, techno, IDM & dark ambient.

May 2012 marked the inception of HypoGeo's introduction to the wider world of music. The first full-length album "Tree of Lies" was released on Zenon records - the infamous Australian psychedelic label.
The album was a huge success for the particularly aggressive and heavy sound, building the bridge between the deepest of psychedelic trance textures, some call it "forest" and the ultimate “Zenonesqué sound.
No matter what the title, the awe of experiencing a live Hypo-performance is second to none, anywhere around the globe.

Currently, HypoGeo is working on the long awaited 2nd studio album; an epitome of creativity, abstract sonic landscapes, and undeniably intricate composition.

Innaya is a singer and passioned Dj with incredible collection of highly inspirational music.
She travels around the world spreading groovy beats and mystical vibes.
Her musical choice can span many genres, depending on the atmosphere.
She believes in the power of union and awareness that flows all over the trace environment.
Every her dj set is a musical expression of transcendental nature of life.
With mix from Innaya your soul will fly high to the sky.

Invisible Ralf:
Ralf was born in the year 1989 in Nijmegen, The Netherlands.
At the age of 10 he started to play the guitar which started the fascination for making music. After his high school he decided to study electronic music. He did two studies in 8 years and finished with a bachelor degree in 2016 as a composer at HKU, Utrecht. He has composed and released various styles of music with different aliases. He also did live electronics and DJing for more than a decade. Ambient and Psybient has become one of his favorite genres to compose. Next to composing autonomic music, Ralf also composes and performs for theatre, dance and film.

bio.fr:
Isantropia is the duo psytechno project run bye Djane Mademoiselle Vitale and Synthetik chaos, owners of Squarelab music. This project explore different type of music and mix the influences of this duo in music and in the life.

Isantropia est le projet duo psytechno géré par Djane Mademoiselle Vitale et Synthetik chaos, propriétaires de la musique de Squarelab. Ce projet explore différents types de musique et mélange les influences de ce duo dans la musique et dans la vie.

Toinan (Scratchy) et Fadi (Itchy)

Deeply inspired by both techno and psytrance, Itchy & Scratchy’s debut album, Unsuccessful Escape, is a firmly dark and rhythmical hybrid blend that takes the listener into a musical and mental trip oscillating between dark prog and forest trance! Definitely not for the faint-hearted!

You will explore the unexplorable !
===================================
Toinan (Scratchy) & Fadi (Itchy)

De la bass music à la techno, Itchy & Scratchy n'ont pas cessé de faire évoluer leur style.
Ils finalisent aujourd'hui leur premier album chez Hadra records.

Inspirés par l'univers de la Dark Progressive et celui de la Forest, leur live vous plonge dans un voyage cosmique à multiples rebondissements.

A contre courant de la Progressive lumineuse, ils ont cherché du coté d'un son noir, groovy, malicieux, sans concession et qui ne cesse d'évoluer.

Just feel the power !

bio.en:
Jaratah is a project born in French alps, as well influenced by extreme metal, post rock that by the new psytrance wave. He proposes a sound resolutely
Hi Tech where mixes speed, psychédély and melodies. Jaratah begins production in 2012, quickly encouraged by his friends. In 2013, he joins the
Sygma crew which proposes him these first lives. In 2015, it is the French label OVNI REC (Lunarave, Dark Elf, Angry Luna...) which recruits him to
release a first EP Init Message, where get involved influences of the psytrance of night, the goa with the swiftness of Hi Tech which characterizes the
style Ovni Rec. After a year of live performance, he actually work on « Jaratah and Friends ». An album exclusivelly make with VS.

bio.fr:
Baigné depuis toujours dans la culture new‐age et rock psyché de ses parents, c'est tout naturellement que Jim Morissens, alias JimSon, est devenu un émissaire de la trance psychédélique. Mais ce n'est qu'après de longues années de recherche musicale à contre-courant de l'essor florissant de la house en Belgique, entre euro-trance et hardcore, que JimSon a finalement été conquis, à la fin des années 90, par la psytrance, son public, ses sonorités et son ambiance.

Après ses premières scènes en 2006 au sein de l'équipe des GanjaTree, JimSon découvre Hadra cette même année et décide de devenir son ambassadeur en Belgique, projet concrétisé en novembre 2009 avec l'organisation de la première Hadra Label Party en Belgique (à Elewijt). En 2010, JimSon fait son entrée au sein du label Hadra Records qu'il promeut à l'étranger et dont le catalogue alimente largement ses DJ Sets en France et à l'étranger. Première compilation « Pangaea », à venir sur le label pour Juillet 2011 !

bio.en:
KabaDrop is a collaboration from David (Kabayun) and Mike (Ridden / Drip Drop).

The project began after the two met in Goa this past year. They played after each other at a party at 9 Bar in Vagator Beach, and from there the connection was born.

Since their meeting in Goa, the two have continued to work on music, meeting numerous times in Mike's studio in Athens, Greece.

The style of their music is a reflection of their experiences in Goa. Neither dark nor light, the music is a high energy liquid sound, with deep soundscapes, twisted leads, dark melodies and a focus on clean production.

Kabayun is the project of David Mostoller, a psytrance producer from the United States. After spending many years honing his sound, performing around the USA, and organizing parties in New York City, David has spent the last 5 years touring the globe, performing in many European cities, in North and Central America, Asia, India and Australia, and at many of the top summer festivals in Europe, including Ozora, MoDem, Antaris, Summer and many more....

After releasing his debut album on 2to6 Records in 2011, in 2012 David joined the team at Looney Moon Records, based in Italy. In 2015 he joined Sangoma Records, a label based in Germany that promotes psytrance without genre boundaries, which is a perfect fit for his music, which floats in the border zone between twilight, forest, and dark, pulling elements from each, for a full power, psychedelic and very danceable vibe.

His tracks have been featured on many compilations and releases from top psytrance labels over the years, currently David is working on a ton of new music, including a new EP and an upcoming album on Sangoma Records, as well as many collaborations with some of his favorite artists and friends in the scene.

Now residing in Philadelphia, PA, USA, Kabayun is available for bookings worldwide.

Kabayun’s music intends to create an environment that stimulates the listener to release themselves from the trials of everyday life and confront their challenges through the trance dance experience. Channeling the spirit of the west, Kabayun pulls together many elements to create an intensely psychedelic experience that lifts the body and the mind to undiscovered plateaus….

Since 2002 and his first contact with french techno and electro cultures, Alexandre became one with this underground part of culture and took part to these movement. Member of Grenoble’s underground culture, he began to arrange in 2003, under the name Kalifer. In 2012, he integrated the collective “Les Rythmes Actuels? with this uptempo project with psyprog, psytrance or progressive techno.

In 2016, Alexandre, aka Soleye, integrate the chill area in Hadra Records. Deeply inspire by nature, love, sharing and well-being, he evolves inside rythms and atmospheres of Chill-Out and Downtempo culture.

His integration on Hadra Records allow to confirm the musical diversity of our alternative area and we enjoy it greatly !

After a long run on Zenonesque prog and Once upon a time psychedelic Kliment's chill project is preparing a double ambient album on Electrik Dream records (France). Various but melodic journey across the universe!

Music with a psychedelic vibe and funky solid groove, sounds about an emotional journey on the dance floor. Signed on Zenon records, Electrick dream and Blue hour sounds. Side projects: Once upon a time, Goatika, idmt.

Today DJ representing of the universe of Trance Progressive on the label Hadra Records and the time switch of the Hadra trance festival, Didier alias Kokmok originally arises from the techno scene and of the South of France. Key element in the development of the label Hadra and in the organization of the evenings Psymind, Kokmok will bring out its release first one in 2008; "Obsessiv Progressiv" is then the fruit of a collaboration with Echotek, Aerospace, Funky Dragon, Ovnimoon or still Ritmo. It is the beginning of the beautiful adventure which will drive him on the most beautiful European dance floor where Kokmok will confirm its style: bass prog and rhythms groovy in the appointment!!

Land Switcher is a new force in Psydub, bringing a fresh and exciting sound that melds Reggae influences and organic samples with the futuristic intensity of Psytrance and the massive bass roars of Dubstep. Liquid, mutating beasts squish, swoop and stomp over driving percussion, conjuring radioactive swamplands filled with suspense, mystery and adventure. It is a meeting of ancient and future, of organic and synthetic, of peace and brutality, evoking the spectrum of emotions between.

bio.fr: Trompettiste et multi-instrumentiste, Cyril nous invite depuis 2008 à découvrir ses univers riches et vivants avec son projet "Lakay" aux influences "WorldDub & PsyDub". Il revient aujourd'hui avec un nouveau projet : "Lapsykay" plus rapide, plus dansant, plus psyché. Mélangeant les couleurs des synthés PsyTrance & PsyDub au son doux et percussif de sa trompette, son set nous fait danser sur des beats énergiques, mélodieux et groovyadelik ! Un pas PsyTrance coloré de nombreuses mélodies à découvrir le jour comme la nuit.

bio.en:
With a career spanning nearly 20 years, from the early days of the
Goa Trance scene and his involvement as co-producer on the seminal
album ‘Cosmology’ on Transient Records as one half of Cosmosis,
Laughing Buddha developed his solo career with releases on Flying
Rhino, T.I.P. Records, Dragonfly (as Drum Druids) and other labels,
before moving on to the green and exciting pastures of the Nano
Records team.

Jez “Buddha? is a highly experienced Live Act and DJ and anyone who
has seen him perform will confirm that he lives up to the name of the
Laughing Buddha! He brings a unique ego-free energy to every party he
plays at, truly coming to life and invigorating the crowd with his driving
technical masterpieces and jovial stage presence.

LunaRave aka Angry LunA ( O.V.N.I Records ) - France

Cosmos, travel, time and History, symbolic notions Lunarave wants to share through his musical universe. Playing many gigs in france since 2004, within the Psynap's crew and later, from 2006, on Hadra Records, Lunarave starts introducing his very own style and touch.
His powerful live act has been more and more acclaimed from gig to gig, and Lunarave has been singled out beyond the borders. His debut album The 4th Sun (released on Hadra Records) have been a real success.
In 2012, he met Neokontrol and together they founded the OVNI Records sub-label, produced under Astrofonik Records.
Now working on side-projects such as LovPacT (LunaRave & Sleeping Forest),AngrY LunA, the hi-tech side project,and more recently Amp Swamp , a massive forest collabs with Dark Elf !!
Lunarave always brings us an all-round live act where mystic sounds lead us into a timeless and epic no-return travel. Stay tuned and have taste of his latest production at his next appearance !

Lunatica is the blasting psychedelic psytrance project from Miguel Solans also known as Lupin by his progressive project!

After producing for years under Lupin project, Miguel decided to take it level further by forming the Lunatica project. Lunatica is all about pushing boundaries between styles & its sound can be described as a fine balance between day time full on and night time psychedelic driving music.

Lunatica has arrived now to swipe the dancefloor away by monstrous maddening liquid sounds !

Born 24th of August in 1985 in Lleida, Spain. Miguel always has been amazed from electronic music. When he was 13 he began to entry at techno sounds, following the preferences of his older brother. Two years later his brother acquires a mixing equip, and Loopin takes the taste rapidly to the art of music mixing.

At 19 years old, Loopin decides to open Zoreks Records, the new records shop in Lleida, his city. This encourages him to submerge definitively in the world of electronic music, forcing him to know the market, the scene, the contact and many important factors to progress in his career. As he looks after Zoreks Record, he embarks in another project. At same time, is then is when he has the chance to get his first contact with psytrance world, discovering it’s magic, very amazed, and slowlly getting involved into it so much that after allmost 10 years with Succes in the techno scene, a new project arrives, so at 22 years old, his progressive psytrance project borns as Lupin. Starts studing music theory, playing piano, and getting a lot of new experiences producing new music in the studio. Three years later Psyshop's main label, Parabola Music, gets interested in his music, and makes possible Lupin's 1st release, with his debut album " Siempre Secuaces ". Then his discography starts to grow up with releases in labels like Fatali Music, Yellow Sunshine Explosion, Spiral Trax, Ovnimoon Records, Synergetic, Plusquam Recs, Zero Gravity Records, Dropland Records and his live act is asked in countries like Mexico, Chile, Greece, Croatia, Belgium, Hungary, Slovenia or Spain.

MAD MAXX is the result of years of hard work, perfecting a unique sound, embodying all the travels, experiences and parties of the past 20 years. The music is a mix of trance, ethnic and deep sounds, with a strong kick and ominous bass line, an electro touch, emotional chants, and at times nostalgic atmospheres, with a BPM ranging from 138 to 145 in general. All of this sonic mayhem delivered in a whirlwind of psychedelia of course....

MAD TRIBE is a collaboration between SPACE TRIBE & MAD MAXX (Olli Wisdom & Max Peterson). They started making music together in 2005 clicking immediately with a shared vision for a full power psychedelic sound with twisted sense of humour. MAD TRIBE received fantastic response to their first album ?SPACED OUT? on TIP records 2015, Bringing a juicy psychedelic experience, guaranteed to spark all 6 senses. In 2016 Mad Tribe released Tuned in Perfectly, Alien Hoax & The LSD party EPs & a stunning vinyl picture disc. In June 2017 Mad Tribe released a UFO shaped vinyl “Out of this World? followed by a new hit album “Amazing tales from Outer Spacé
A new MAD TRIBE record – PLANET GONE MAD / ROCKET POWER will be released on TIP records as a double A side glow in the dark vinyl & digital download in March 2018
Mad Tribe are visiting this planet somewhere near you, so prepare for abduction!
Mad Tribe… You don’t have to be Mad, But…

For this woman it is “Vitalé to be nourished with music. Multiple variations of musical genres have shaped her - creating a balanced appreciation for individual tracks - which shines bright through her mixing style.
As a co-founder of record label SquareLab , she and Synthetik Chaos have brought different corners of the psychedelic electronic music world together with next level beats.
She has played in many countries around the globe in both large festivals and intimate gatherings, and travels frequently to seek out new venues in order to spread the vibe and awaken inspirations within.
Recently, Mademoiselle Vitale has bridged even more gaps by incorporating artist in her sets from the Purple Hexagon label to add a deep layer of dance floor surprises.
With refreshing sound, beautiful sights and a steadfast energy to unite all through music, Mademoiselle Vitale is dedicated to creating an atmosphere for us to share through dance and sound. Passionate imagination, crystal vision, and vibrant emotions are very important to her and are certainly felt in her selections - a true reflection of her spirit.

Pour cette femme c'est "Vitale" se nourrir de musique. De multiples variations de genres musicaux l'ont façonnée - créant une appréciation équilibrée pour les morceaux individuels - qui brille à travers son style de mixage.
En tant que co-fondatrice de la maison de disques SquareLab music, elle et Synthetik Chaos ont rapproché différents coins du monde de la musique électronique psychédélique avec des rythmes de niveau supérieur.
Elle a joué dans de nombreux pays autour du globe dans de grands festivals et des rencontres intimes, et voyage fréquemment pour chercher de nouveaux lieux afin de répandre l'ambiance et éveiller les inspirations à l'intérieur.
Récemment, Mademoiselle Vitale a comblé encore plus de lacunes en intégrant l'artiste dans ses décors du label Purple Hexagon records pour ajouter une couche profonde de surprises au dancefloor.
Avec un son rafraîchissant, de beaux paysages et une énergie inébranlable pour s'unir à travers la musique, Mademoiselle Vitale se consacre à créer une atmosphère que nous partageons à travers la danse et le son. L'imagination passionnée, la vision cristalline et les émotions vibrantes sont très importantes pour elle et sont certainement ressenties dans ses sélections - un vrai reflet de son esprit.

bio.fr:
Investi dans l'association Hadra depuis plus de 10 ans, Manu a intégré son label comme DJ dès 2008.
Résolument orienté vers la face sombre d'Hadra Records, il partage régulièrement la scène en versus avec Shotu, par ailleurs binôme de choix pour la sortie en 2011 sur le label de la compilation Twisted Vision #3. Manu s'attache à promouvoir via des DJ Sets exceptionnels la scène psyche dark internationale avec un faible non dissimulé pour les artistes de Parvati et Wildthings !

C'est dans les crews de DJ/Compositeur Bass Jump, Eddy Rumas ou encore LGNE qu'il fait ses débuts sur scène en proposant des sets typés Bass Music et en étant bénévole/organisateur pour ces organisations.

Après avoir joué dans des soirées et festivals grenoblois de renommée tels que le Bassodrome Festival ou bien une soirée de promotion pour l'Outlook Festival il décide de se consacrer pleinement à la production.

Son univers musical se définit par un son sombre, hypnotique, puissant, et mêlant quelques touches de psychédélisme.
Passionné de sound design il a su graduellement développer et cultiver une identité sonore atypique.

Ils sont devenus un duo incontournable, prêt à lever les foules, le smile jusqu'aux oreilles ! Si vous ne les avez pas encore vu, c'est l'occasion ! Tous deux membres du collectif Psymind, Miss TeKiX et Dj Oïkia commencent à collaborer derrière les platines durant l’été 2015. Dès lors, une véritable alchimie guide ces deux Djs dans la construction de leurs sets. Leurs influences respectives et leur complicité dessine une nouvelle dynamique dans la construction de leurs sets. Le duo développe un style de mix harmonique et groovy qui lui ai propre et dont la sélection oscille entre psyprog, full-on et psyché.

bio.en:
Bio :
Pioneer of the hip-hip movement, she has discovered techno music in 1999. Events organizer for the Batofar and during rave parties where she becomes an enthusiastic activist of this musical style. After being a part of some labels such as Spin Twist, Miss Tick first joins Bus Records and then create her own Techno Label : NCTRN Records (Nocturne records). She now plays on the international scene : Europe, Australia, Asia and Big Festivals as Ozora, Modem Festival, Infamous Armada, Experience ...
Miss Tick loves playing techno sets, a bit tribal with a touch of glamourous ; a style that rocks and rolls !

Mobitex is an electronic music producer from Israel aka Eyal Markovich.His main style is Chillgressive psytance, which is a combination of psytance elements with chill and ambient music.Eyal is also a former member in the chillgressive music act Call Profondita with this act he released two full length albums - Ceil and Dracarys both of them on Altar rec. Canada.

Last year he released his solo album as Mobitex - "the flow" also on altar rec.His live sets are define as a psychedelic journiy which starts on low Bpm ( around 95 - 100 ) and ends in higher Bpm ( around 115-120) . His sets including his discogrephy and new unreleased tracks and live synth which are added live throughout his sets.

Momentum is Aristides Katsinopoulos's solo project,
born and raised in Athens-Greece.
His first experiences with electronic music was at the early 2000's,
when he started following the music wave and collecting music from various electonic genres.
Ambient seems to satisfy his musical taste and starts exploring the depths of music production.
He, mainly, focuses on ambient & downtempo sounds,with deep atmospheric soundscapes and textures.
Aristides's musical proccess is always on progression in order to discover new paths of expression.
Side progects :
Sygnals with Alex(R.I.P.) & Daoine Sidhe

bio.fr:
Il a découvert la musique à l'âge de 15 ans et depuis et bien... c'est une belle histoire qui ne cesse d'évoluer, d'avancer et de transmettre encore, jusqu'à ce jour, le plus beau de tous les messages... Celui de l'amour.

Sa musique c'est un peu de tout, et de rien... C'est le petit mélange du vide et de l'infini qui fait jaillir des sonorités aussi sombres que lumineuses. Le son de corde de la Gratte, la vibration de la Voix, le percutant de la Percussion, tout cela s'entremêle dans un show psychédélique. En passant du Glitch-Hop à la Techno et faisant une halte par les batteries massives de la Drum and Bass, le voyage promet d'être... intense.

bio.en:
Sarah Naima grew up in an old hippi environment and extraordinary musical family, these love and sensitivity for the music came quite early in her life.
Already at the age of 6 she started playing keyboard and since then her passion for music grew steady.

In the year 1996 she came in touch with electronic music for the first time.
Since then she has been following many different styles in the electronic scene with big enthusiasm until she made the experience of a Psychedelic- Trance Party in the year 2003.

She was instantly hooked with this scene and she fell deeply in love with the music, the energy and all these inspiring, magical places and people surrounding her.

Naima started her journey as a DJ seriously 2009, in her sets she symbolize psychedelic sounds, mystical & powerful deep tunes for colourful nights or energetic mornings.

The style and the kind of music she chooses for her Sets depends on the atmosphere and energy around but also on the setting and at which time she plays.

During the last years Naima grew as an international DJ,and she has performed on various international Parties and some of the best Festivals all around the world like Ozora Festival - Hungary,Experience - Thailand, Midnightsun Festival - Norway, MoDem - Croatia, Antaris, Freqs of Nature, Waldfrieden,VuuV - Festival - Germany, Blackmoon Festival -Italy, Solstice Festival - Netherlands, Transahara - Marocco, One Love - Switzerland, Kosmos Festival - Finnland,Yaga Gathering - Lithuania, Galaxy Evolution Festival - India,Belantara - Malaysia,Spiritual Ritual Festival- Nepal.

So far she played in:
Australia, Austria,Brazil, Belgium, Canada,Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland,France,Germany, Greece, Hungary, India, Italy,Mexico,Malaysia,Malta,Macedonia,Nepal,UK; Netherlands, Norway, Lithuania Portugal, Poland, Romania, Russia,United Emirates,Spain,Sweden,Switzerland,Slowenia, Slovakia,Thailand, Turkey.

Native of Montpellier / South of France.
He's one of those French talents for who music more than a passion ,is a real life style. Steff caught the electronic and djing bug with Trance music in the early 90s, switching after few years to a solid 15 years career on the international underground house and techno scene. His own style and music have been developed in the course of different encounters playing major partys and festivals on 4 continents (Singapore, Chile, Tunisia, Dubai, Brazil, Argentina, USA, Ibiza, Malaysia, Germany, Italy, Noumea, Tahiti, Bora Bora, Thailand, and the list goes on)
Behind the desks Steff is a “morning act lover?, Playing powerful Music groovy as hell and always adapting his music to the crowd using different sounds from acidified Deep Techno to psychedelic trance .A rare blend of cutback grooves and hypnotic leads, all backed up with solid basslines.

bio.fr:
Neuronod est un Producer et Dj basé à Paris.
Après des années à mixer de multiples genres tels que la Drum&Bass, le Techno ou encore la DarkProg, il commença finalement à produire sa propre musique en 2013.

En tant que Dj, il a toujours été attiré par les tracks aux ambiances deep et atmosphériques avec une touche de psychédélisme. Il regroupe dorénavant ces différentes énergies et influences dans ses productions que l'on peut qualifier de Psygressive ou DarkProg.

Représentant du label Allemand "Glitchy Tonic Records" et membre de l'association parisienne "Atomes" , il s'exprime aussi dernièrement via son side project Darkprog en duo appelé "Neurolabz".

Neuronod is a French Producer and Dj based in Paris.
After years of Djing multiple genres like Drum&Bass, Techno and Dark Prog, he finally started producing his own music in 2013.

As a Dj, he always been attracted by bass-oriented tracks with deep and atmospheric ambiances and a hint of psychedelia, now bringing together those different energies and influences in his own productions that you could describe as "Dark Prog" or "Psygressive".

Label Dj for Glitchy Tonic Records and member of the parisian association "Atomes", he also express himself through his fresh duo side project with his very good friend Naolabz which is called Neurolabz, also focusing on twisted dark prog!

Nëru est un projet live Downtempo allant de l'Ambiant au Psydub en passant par la musique Chill, Techno, Trance avec des influences Ethniques.

Accompagné de ses synthétiseurs analogiques (Erebus, Nyx & Hades de chez Dreadbox FX), de sa voix et de ses séquenceurs (Bitwig & Arturia Beatstep Pro), Nëru propose une musique dont l'objectif principal et d'inviter les auditeurs au voyage.

Sa musique est pour lui le meilleur moyen de partager ses émotions, d'apporter une touche d'optimisme et de bonheur, d'être en adéquation avec son âme.

Inspiré par des labels comme Shanti Planti et des artistes comme Kaya Project, OTT, Polo & Pan, Light Child Project. Nëru s'évertue à faire une musique qui lui plaît, sans s'imposer de limite de styles ou de formatage musical précis.

ODDWAVE fait ses premiers pas dans la musique dès l'âge de 12 ans en tant que guitariste dans divers groupes ( funk/ jazz fusion/ métal / hip hop) et se
passionne très vite pour la production. Il monte un studio d'enregistrement et produit plusieurs albums pour ses differents projets pendant plus de 5
ans.
A l'âge de 18 ans, il découvre plus sérieusement la musique électronique et plus particulièrement la trance.
Il rentre par la suite en tant qu'artiste et technicien du son dans
les associations SOUNDZ PAINTERZ puis TRANSUBTIL.
Au fil des années suivantes il se fait connaitre de beaucoup de programmateurs de soirées et festivals
qui lui permettrons de jouer auprès de grands et d'acquérir une notoriété auprès des passionnés de musique électronique.
En 2013 il intègre le label HADRA Records avec lequel il travaille activement sur ses compositions et ses lives, Aujourd'hui, Apres 2 album et de multiples EP, sa musique raisonne sur les plus gros dancefloor Européens.
Passionné et amoureux du son, ODDWAVE est en constante recherche de nouvelles sonorités, de projets, de partage, d'évolution, le tout dans un esprit libre et ouvert ;)

bio.en: Greek producers Vasilis Kesalidis and Ioannis Konstantios started One Arc Degree with the intent to explore how music can trigger different emotional responses and memories, and then channel those evocations back into the music itself in a continuous cycle of discovery and renewal. Their discography as One Arc Degree span a wide range of music labels, such as Synphaera, Blue Tunes, Iboga, Ultimae and Morphosis Records, to name a few. Currently on their 3rd LP -after a constant stream of releases this decade- OAD show no signs of slowing down anytime soon.

Music has One Function – To make you feel.
From the second the sound waves hit your body and soul it touches your nerves and transforms your senses.
Where and how will that feeling take you in the sonic journey depends on your mood, personality and your surroundings.
But it is that first contact point, that magical moment when you get hooked that set the rest of the tune.

This One Function, the first contact point will be facilitated by Jenia Akerman from Israel.
Akerman started his musical experimentation since he was 16 years old, playing in outdoor parties and quickly having the itch to make his own music.
Influenced by inspirational artists such as The Delta, Cosma and Hallucinogen, Akerman decided to take his craft seriously and at the age of 19 went to BPM music School.
Polishing his ideas and artistic identity, he released his first release in 2009 called Tropical Energy on Spliff Music.
Exploring his abilities even further, in 2011 Jenia started his first solo project Unicode, a melodic and uplifting Progressive Trance fusion.
As Unicode, Akerman released his tunes in all the big labels such as Iboga, Blue Tunes, Spin Twist and Iono Music.

As Jenia’s project developed he decided to go back to his roots with Progressive Trance under the alias One Function.
In this project Akerman decided to focus more on spirituality, while combining oriental vocals and old school elements, which create his own unique psychedelic interpretation.
His first release as One Function – Back to My Roots EP - was released in 2015 on Iono Music and received immediate attention across the world.
Supported by the biggest names in the Psytrance scene, from Protonica , John 00 Fleming , Egorythmia, Yahel and Guadium he is conquering the global sonic sphere.
After playing in many indoor and outdoor events including: Australia, Swiss, Germany, Israel, France, Argentina,
his path to your One Function is set.

Onkel Dunkel is the musical alter ego of Monno, producer, mastering engineer, synth lover and sound designer. Born and raised in Denmark, he has been involved with music one way or another since his late teens. First as a bass player at the age of 17, but the introduction to Psychedelic Trance lead to him ditching his bass and getting into computers and synthesizers. Fast forward a couple of years and the project Grapes of Wrath was born. Together with his partner in crime Jaffa they were on a mission to make harder edged music than most were doing at the time. This culminated in the seminal split album with Meteloids: “Tits on Firé Released on Parvati Records in 2004 and considered a milestone release for that label. Since 2006 Monno has mainly released music as Onkel Dunkel and his second album “Connections? Was released in June 2017. Comprised of only tracks with friends that came for a visit in the studio, it´s a mix of influences spanning far and wide.

After a busy winter he is now back in the studio working on new material to keep your synapses firing at maximum.

Best enjoyed loud in mild climates, no expiry date.

bio.fr:
Dans les années 90, Opale découvre les sons Psybient Ethnik Downtempo et embrasse la culture psychédélique, révélation qui a changé sa vie et la perception qu’elle en a.

Invitée aux quatre coins du monde à jouer pour des évènements aussi variés qu’hétéroclites tel que le Burning Man dans le Nevada, dans de nombreux festivals Trance ou encore dans le monde de l’Art Contemporain.
Depuis quelques années elle accélère le tempo en collaborant avec différents artistes en live comme ADN pour le festival Ozora, chez les épiques pirates des World People, ou encore les Festivals Eclipse et Open Mind au Canada. Avec Don Pedro Askata aux percussions électroniques au Boom, Karma Kusala, & Aya Atma, Lakay à la trompette lors de l’Hadra 2016, ou également Tasha, aux fameux rendez-vous Chrysalid & Wildthings en Angleterre.

Elle nous régale sur des ambiances Electro-World, tissées de samples venus d’ailleurs, mariés à des nappes émotives, vous conviant à la rejoindre dans l’ivresse des profondeurs… Des plus célestes aux plus tribales... Des plus sensibles aux plus mentales.

Cette passion l’amène à devenir responsable de la programmation musicale du Festival Harmonic qui a lieu dans le Sud de la France chaque été. Lancé en 2015, Harmonic est un évènement prometteur, orienté vers les cultures alternatives, qu’elles soient musicales, environnementales, spirituelles ou celles du bien-être.

Opale travaille sur une compilation à sortir sur le label Ultimae courant 2019 qui présentera le travail de jeunes artistes découverts sur sa route et de grands noms du milieu Downtempo.

Dans les années 90, Opale découvre les sons Psybient Ethnik Downtempo et embrasse la culture psychédélique, révélation qui a changé sa vie et la perception qu’elle en a.

Invitée aux quatre coins du monde à jouer pour des évènements aussi variés qu’hétéroclites tel que le Burning Man dans le Nevada, dans de nombreux festivals Trance ou encore dans le monde de l’Art Contemporain.
